Class AIRS_local

java.lang.Object

public class AIRS_local
extends Service

Class to implement the local recording

 void Discover(Activity airs)
          Called to start all sensor handlers and inquire the discovered sensors from these handlers The function also populates the UI sensor list and shows the appropriate view This function needs calling from a UI thread, e.g., from AIRS_record_tab

 void onCreate()
          Called when starting the service the first time around
 void onDestroy()
          Called when service is destroyed, e.g., by stopService() Here, we tear down all recording threads, close all handlers, unregister receivers for battery signal and close the thread for indicating the recording
 void onLowMemory()
          Called when system is running low on memory

          Asks threads to pause

          Asks threads to refresh latest value
 void Restart(boolean check)
          Restarts the AIRS_local recording service, calling the Rediscover() function, restarting all recordings threads and then make the service sticky

          Ask threads to pause recording.

Method Detail

onBind

public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)
Returns current instance of AIRS_local Service to anybody binding to AIRS_local

Parameters:

Returns:
current instance to service

onLowMemory

public void onLowMemory()

See Also:
Service

onCreate

public void onCreate()
Called when starting the service the first time around

See Also:
Service

execStorage

public void execStorage(long milli,
                        String query)
Synchronised method for writing to AIRS database from the recording threads being created

Parameters:
milli - timestamp of the recording
query - the SQL query being executed, formed in the recording threads

onDestroy

public void onDestroy()
Called when service is destroyed, e.g., by stopService() Here, we tear down all recording threads, close all handlers, unregister receivers for battery signal and close the thread for indicating the recording

onStartCommand

public int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                          int flags,
                          int startId)

refresh_values

public void refresh_values()
Asks threads to refresh latest value

pause_threads

public void pause_threads()
Asks threads to pause

getValue

public String getValue(int j)
Gets Value of the j-th thread

Parameters:
j - index to thread which should provide the value
Returns:
String of the current recording

getSymbol

public String getSymbol(int j)
Gets Sensor symbol that the j-th thread is recording

Parameters:
j - index to thread which should provide the symbol
Returns:
String of the sensor symbol, see http://tecvis.co.uk/software/airs/internal-workings for list of supported sensor symbols

share

public String share(int j)
Sharing info for sensor entry that j-th thread is recording

Parameters:
j - index to thread which should provide the sharing string
Returns:
String to be shared or null if nothing to share

show_info

public void show_info(int j)
Show timeline, map or similar for sensor entry that j-th thread is recording

Parameters:
j - index to thread which should show the information

resume_threads

public void resume_threads()
Ask threads to pause recording. Where callback receivers are used, such pausing is not supported!

selectall

public void selectall()
Sets all sensors being selected in the sensor list - called from UI in AIRS_record_tab

unselectall

public void unselectall()
Unselects all sensors in the sensor list - called from UI in AIRS_record_tab

sensor_info

public void sensor_info()
Builds AlertDialog with sensor information

startMeasurements

public boolean startMeasurements(boolean restarted)
Sets up the main threads to run, acquire values, store them locally and display them (if wanted)

Parameters:
restarted - is this measurements restarted (true) or not (false).
Returns:
true if successfully started, false otherwise

saveSelections

public void saveSelections()
Save all sensor selections in the UI sensor list as persistent values in the preference file

Discover

public void Discover(Activity airs)
Called to start all sensor handlers and inquire the discovered sensors from these handlers The function also populates the UI sensor list and shows the appropriate view This function needs calling from a UI thread, e.g., from AIRS_record_tab

Parameters:
airs - Reference to the current Activity

Restart

public void Restart(boolean check)
Restarts the AIRS_local recording service, calling the Rediscover() function, restarting all recordings threads and then make the service sticky

Parameters:
check - Should the service been running (true) and was it therefore restarted?
